org.hibernate.jpa.event.internal.core

Class JpaPostUpdateEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.jpa.event.internal.core.JpaPostUpdateEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, PostCollectionRecreateEventListener, PostCollectionRemoveEventListener, PostCollectionUpdateEventListener, PostUpdateEventListener, HibernateEntityManagerEventListener, CallbackRegistryConsumer

    public class JpaPostUpdateEventListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements PostUpdateEventListener, CallbackRegistryConsumer, PostCollectionRecreateEventListener, PostCollectionRemoveEventListener, PostCollectionUpdateEventListener
    Implementation of the post update listeners.
